title: Promise Cinderella
overview: Hayame's happily married life comes to an abrupt end and she is left alone, penniless and homeless! Things couldn't get any worse, until she runs into rich high-school brat Issei, whom she had previously humiliated! Sparks fly as two worlds collide in this unlikely Cinderella story! ~~ Adapted from a manga of the same name by Tachibana Oreko.
